00057 namespace {
00058   const char *DEFAULT_HOST = "localhost";
00059   const int DEFAULT_PORT = 11255;
00060   const int DEFAULT_TIMEOUT = 10;
00061   const char *usage[] = {
00062     "usage: sampleClient [OPTIONS] <input-file>",
00063     "",
00064     "OPTIONS:",
00065     "  --host=<name>   Specifies the host to connect to (default = localhost)",
00066     "  --port=<n>      Specifies the port to connect to (default = 11255)",
00067     "  --reactors=<n>  Specifies the number of reactors (default=1)",
00068     "  --recv-addr=<addr>  Let the server connect to us by listening for",
00069     "                  connection request on <addr> (host:port).  The address",
00070     "                  that the server is connecting from should be the same",
00071     "                  as what's specified with --host and --port or the defaults.",
00072     "                  (TCP only)",
00073     "  --timeout=<t>   Specifies the connection timeout in seconds (default=10)",
00074     "  --verbose       Generate verbose output",
00075     "  --udp           Operate in UDP mode instead of TCP",
00076     "",
00077     "This is a sample program to test the AsyncComm library.  It establishes",
00078     "a connection with the sampleServer and sends each line of the input file",
00079     "to the server.  Each reply from the server is echoed to stdout.",
00080     (const char *)0
00081   };
00082   bool gVerbose = false;
00083 }

00092 class ResponseHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00093 
00094 public:
00095 
00096   ResponseHandler() : m_queue(), m_mutex(), m_cond() { return; }
00097   virtual ~ResponseHandler() { return; }
00098 
00099   virtual void handle(EventPtr &eventPtr) = 0;
00100 
00101   virtual bool get_response(EventPtr &eventPtr) = 0;
00102 
00103 protected:
00104   queue<EventPtr>   m_queue;
00105   boost::mutex      m_mutex;
00106   boost::condition  m_cond;
00107 };

00119 class ResponseHandlerTCP : public ResponseHandler {
00120 
00121 public:
00122 
00123   ResponseHandlerTCP() : ResponseHandler(), m_connected(false) { return; }
00124   
00125   virtual void handle(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00126     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00127     if (eventPtr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00128       if (gVerbose)
00129         HT_INFOF("Connection Established - %s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00130       m_connected = true;
00131       m_cond.notify_one();
00132     }
00133     else if (eventPtr->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00134       if (eventPtr->error != 0) {
00135         HT_INFOF("Disconnect : %s", Error::get_text(eventPtr->error));
00136       }
00137       else {
00138         HT_INFO("Disconnect.");
00139       }
00140       m_connected = false;
00141       m_cond.notify_one();
00142     }
00143     else if (eventPtr->type == Event::ERROR) {
00144       HT_INFOF("Error : %s", Error::get_text(eventPtr->error));
00145       //exit(1);
00146     }
00147     else if (eventPtr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00148       m_queue.push(eventPtr);
00149       m_cond.notify_one();
00150     }
00151   }
00152 
00153   bool wait_for_connection() {
00154     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00155     if (m_connected)
00156       return true;
00157     m_cond.wait(lock);
00158     return m_connected;
00159   }
00160 
00161   virtual bool get_response(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00162     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00163     while (m_queue.empty()) {
00164       if (m_connected == false)
00165         return false;
00166       m_cond.wait(lock);
00167     }
00168     eventPtr = m_queue.front();
00169     m_queue.pop();
00170     return true;
00171   }
00172 
00173 private:
00174   bool m_connected;
00175 };

00183 class HandlerFactory : public ConnectionHandlerFactory {
00184 public:
00185   HandlerFactory(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00186     m_dispatch_handler_ptr = dhp;
00187   }
00188   virtual void get_instance(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00189     dhp = m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00190   }
00191 private:
00192   DispatchHandlerPtr m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00193 };

00203 class ResponseHandlerUDP : public ResponseHandler {
00204 
00205 public:
00206 
00207   ResponseHandlerUDP() : ResponseHandler() { return; }
00208   
00209   virtual void handle(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00210     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00211     if (eventPtr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00212       m_queue.push(eventPtr);
00213       m_cond.notify_one();
00214     }
00215     else {
00216       HT_INFOF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00217       //exit(1);
00218     }
00219   }
00220 
00221   virtual bool get_response(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00222     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00223     while (m_queue.empty()) {
00224       m_cond.wait(lock);
00225     }
00226     eventPtr = m_queue.front();
00227     m_queue.pop();
00228     return true;
00229   }
00230 };

00239 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00240   Comm *comm;
00241   int rval;
00242   const char *host = DEFAULT_HOST;
00243   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00244   uint16_t port = DEFAULT_PORT;
00245   time_t timeout = DEFAULT_TIMEOUT;
00246   int reactorCount = 1;
00247   const char *inputFile = 0;
00248   HeaderBuilder hbuilder;
00249   int error;
00250   EventPtr eventPtr;
00251   ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr chfPtr;
00252   DispatchHandlerPtr dhp;
00253   ResponseHandler *respHandler;
00254   bool udpMode = false;
00255   string line;
00256   int outstanding = 0;
00257   int maxOutstanding = 50;
00258   const char *str;
00259   struct sockaddr_in localAddr;
00260 
00261   memset(&localAddr, 0, sizeof(localAddr));
00262   
00263   if (argc == 1)
00264     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00265 
00266   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00267   ReactorFactory::initialize(1);
00268 
00269   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00270     if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--host=", 7))
00271       host = &argv[i][7];
00272     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--port=", 7)) {
00273       rval = atoi(&argv[i][7]);
00274       if (rval <= 1024 || rval > 65535) {
00275         cerr << "Invalid port.  Must be in the range of 1024-65535." << endl;
00276         exit(1);
00277       }
00278       port = rval;
00279     }
00280     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--timeout=", 10))
00281       timeout = (time_t)atoi(&argv[i][10]);
00282     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--udp"))
00283       udpMode = true;
00284     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--reactors=", 11))
00285       reactorCount = atoi(&argv[i][11]);
00286     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--recv-addr=", 12)) {
00287       if (!InetAddr::initialize(&localAddr, &argv[i][12]))
00288         HT_ABORT;
00289     }
00290     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose")) {
00291       gVerbose = true;
00292     }
00293     else if (inputFile == 0)
00294       inputFile = argv[i];
00295     else
00296       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00297   }
00298 
00299   if (inputFile == 0)
00300     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00301 
00302   if (!InetAddr::initialize(&addr, host, port))
00303     exit(1);
00304 
00305   comm = new Comm();
00306 
00307   ifstream myfile(inputFile);
00308 
00309   if (!myfile.is_open()) {
00310     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open file '%s' : %s", inputFile, strerror(errno));
00311     return 0;
00312   }
00313 
00314   if (udpMode) {
00315     assert(localAddr.sin_port == 0);
00316     respHandler = new ResponseHandlerUDP();
00317     dhp = respHandler;
00318     port++;
00319     InetAddr::initialize(&localAddr, INADDR_ANY, port);
00320     if ((error = comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&localAddr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00321       std::string str;
00322       HT_ERRORF("Problem creating UDP receive socket %s - %s", InetAddr::string_format(str, localAddr), Error::get_text(error));
00323       exit(1);
00324     }
00325   }
00326   else {
00327     respHandler = new ResponseHandlerTCP();
00328     dhp = respHandler;
00329 
00330     if (localAddr.sin_port == 0) {
00331       if ((error = comm->connect(addr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00332         HT_ERRORF("Comm::connect error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00333         exit(1);
00334       }
00335     }
00336     else {
00337       chfPtr = new HandlerFactory(dhp);
00338       if ((error = comm->listen(localAddr, chfPtr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00339         HT_ERRORF("Comm::listen error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00340         exit(1);
00341       }
00342     }
00343     if (!((ResponseHandlerTCP *)respHandler)->wait_for_connection())
00344       exit(1);
00345 
00346   }
00347 
00348   while (!myfile.eof() ) {
00349     getline (myfile,line);
00350     if (line.length() > 0) {
00351       CommBufPtr cbufPtr( new CommBuf(hbuilder, Serialization::encoded_length_string(line)) );
00352       cbufPtr->append_string(line);
00353       int retries = 0;
00354 
00355       if (udpMode) {
00356         if ((error = comm->send_datagram(addr, localAddr, cbufPtr)) != Error::OK) {
00357           HT_ERRORF("Problem sending datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00358           return 1;
00359         }
00360       }
00361       else {
00362         while ((error = comm->send_request(addr, timeout, cbufPtr, respHandler)) != Error::OK) {
00363           if (error == Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED) {
00364             if (retries == 5) {
00365               HT_ERROR("Connection timeout.");
00366               return 1;
00367             }
00368             poll(0, 0, 1000);
00369             retries++;
00370           }
00371           else {
00372             HT_ERRORF("CommEngine::send_message returned '%s'", Error::get_text(error));
00373             return 1;
00374           }
00375         }
00376       }
00377       outstanding++;
00378 
00379       if (outstanding  > maxOutstanding) {
00380         if (!respHandler->get_response(eventPtr))
00381           break;
00382         if (!Serialization::decode_string(&eventPtr->message, &eventPtr->messageLen, &str))
00383           cout << "ERROR: deserialization problem." << endl;
00384         else {
00385           if (*str != 0)
00386             cout << "ECHO: " << str << endl;
00387           else
00388             cout << "[NULL]" << endl;
00389         }
00390         outstanding--;
00391       }
00392     }
00393   }
00394 
00395   while (outstanding > 0 && respHandler->get_response(eventPtr)) {
00396     if (!Serialization::decode_string(&eventPtr->message, &eventPtr->messageLen, &str))
00397       cout << "ERROR: deserialization problem." << endl;
00398     else {
00399       if (str != 0)
00400         cout << "ECHO: " << str << endl;
00401       else
00402         cout << "[NULL]" << endl;
00403     }
00404     //cout << "out = " << outstanding << endl;
00405     outstanding--;
00406   }
00407 
00408 
00409   myfile.close();
00410 
00411   ReactorFactory::destroy();
00412 
00413   delete comm;
00414   return 0;
00415 }
